summary: This will mute or lower the volume level of the bards songs or instrumental solo\'s
descriptionHtml:
As per a request I bring you yet another in the Muffle Series - Muffle The Bards. This will mute or lower the volume level of the bards songs or instrumental solo\'s. Someone requested it so here it is. It comes in 2 versions mute and quiet. Just pick one.

Known Issues: On the quiet version their lips don\'t move. Someone must have slipped them a lip paralysis drug.



[color=yellow]Check Out My Other Mods[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15567]Stop The Dark Brotherhood Forever Quest From Returning[/url]
